title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 250: Featuring Pat Maroon + Cam Janssen
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Pat Maroon and Cam Janssen. The guys join (48:11) to talk about the Blues crazy Stanley Cup run last season, their long friendship, playing in Tampa and a ton more. The guys also touch on the GM meetings and most importantly, the rumors of a new puck. The fellas wrap up with some Mario Lemieux talk and they discuss the Stars giving out tattoo sleeves for Tyler Seguin.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
